    • Field Detail

      • PATCH

        public static final org.restlet.data.Method PATCH
        Requests that the origin server accepts the entity enclosed in the request as a new subordinate of the resource identified by the request URI.
        See Also:
        HTTP RFC - 9.5 POST

        public HttpRemoteJsonResource(String uri,
                      String username,
                      String password)
        Create a HttpRemoteJsonResource with credentials.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of this resource.
        username - Username for HTTP basic authentication
        password - Password for HTTP basic authentication.
